attributes.title: Powerful Cognitions To Manifest Paramashiva In Your Life - Directly From Paramashiva || 26 Jan 2021
attributes.description:
26 JANUARY 2021 

*SO NICE TO SEE YOU ALL AFTER A LONG TIME FOR SATSANG!

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*THE CONCLUSIONS YOU ARRIVE NOW ABOUT EVERYTHING IS THE FOUNDATION FOR THE LIFE YOU ARE GOING TO MANIFEST AS FUTURE. 

*IF YOU HAVE THE RIGHT CONCLUSION ABOUT PARAMASHIVA, YOU WILL SIMPLY MANIFEST HIM IN YOUR LIFE.

*HE WILL BE PART OF YOUR FUTURE.

*IF YOU HAVE CONFUSED CONCLUSIONS ABOUT PARAMASHIVA, YOU WILL HAVE CONFUSION MANIFESTING AS YOUR LIFE.

*WHETHER YOUR CONCLUSIONS ABOUT PARAMASHIVA OR ABOUT YOURSELF, GOD, WORLD OR ABOUT YOUR FAMILY, WEALTH, HEALTH, ALL YOUR CONCLUSIONS BECOME THE BLUEPRINT FOR YOUR FUTURE.

*ALL THE COGNITIONS YOU ARRIVE AT ARE THE CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS.

*FOR EXAMPLE: SOMETIMES, YOU MAY NOT BE REALLY BELIEVING THE CAPACITY OF FASTING BUT CONSCIOUSLY YOU DECIDE AND COME TO THE CONCLUSION: ‘FASTING IS A GREAT SUPPORT FOR MY BODY TO REBUILD ITSELF. I AM COMING TO THIS AS A CONSCIOUS CONCLUSION.’ THEN IT BECOMES A COGNITION.

*WHETHER TODAY OR TOMORROW OR WITHIN FEW WEEKS, THIS WILL MANIFEST AS YOUR FUTURE BECAUSE ANY CONSCIOUS CONCLUSION DOES NOT DIE. IT IS A SEED WITH LIFE.

*EVEN ON THE SOLID ROCK, A SEED WITH LIFE DOES NOT DIE. IT WAITS FOR THE ROCK TO GET POWDERED AS SAND, IT WAITS FOR THE RAIN, FOR THE RIGHT ECOSYSTEM AND ATMOSPHERE FOR IT TO SPROUT AND IT SPROUTS. 

*CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS YOU ARRIVE AT FORM THE BASIS OF YOUR LIFE MANIFESTATION, EXISTENCE, FUTURE.

*SO, COMING TO THE RIGHT CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS IS MOST IMPORTANT FOR MANIFESTING HEALTH, WEALTH, INTELLIGENCE, SMARTNESS, POWERFULNESS, PARAMASHIVA, POWERS, ALL THE BEST THINGS  OF LIFE.

*COMING TO THE RIGHT CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS IS LITERALLY EQUIVALENT TO MANIFESTING THE THINGS YOU WANT. 

*I WANT TO APOLOGISE FOR CHANGING MY SATSANG TIME. I JUST UNCLUTCH MYSELF FROM THIS CONCEPT OF TIME AND THROW MYSELF AT THE FEET OF PARAMASHIVA. HE JUST OOZES OUT.  

*FROM THE TIME I LEFT INDIA, LITERALLY I AM SITTING INSIDE ONE ROOM. RARELY I COME OUT, THAT ALSO FOR FEW MINUTES OF WALK. 

*OTHERWISE, I AM ALWAYS IN THE ROOM, MOST OF THE TIME IN PADMASANA, IN SAMADHI. WHENEVER PARAMASHIVA SETTLES, I COME OUT AND TALK. WHEN HE UNCLUTCHES, I REST IN SAMADHI. 

*BUT I COMMIT WITH ALL OF YOU, I WILL GIVE YOU THE BEST THINGS. 

*IT IS LIKE I AM DIVING DEEP INTO THE COSMOS AND GETTING THE BEST QUALITY PEARLS FOR YOU. PLEASE TOLERATE FOR THE IRREGULAR TIMINGS. 

*IF YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO WATCH LIVE, IT’S OK - YOU CAN WATCH THE RECORDED SATSANG. 

*I TOLD THE SOCIAL MEDIA TEAM TO PUT UP MY SATSANGS FULLY UNEDITED IN YOUTUBE AND EVERYWHERE ELSE SO YOU CAN ENJOY WHENEVER YOU WANT.

*BECAUSE OF THE FREEDOM OF BEING IN SAMADHI, I HAVE THE CONFIDENCE OF GIVING MORE SATSANGS, MORE DARSHANS. 

*BECAUSE I AM NOT BOUND BY THE TIMING, I AM INTERESTED IN GETTING THE BEST QUALITY OF THE TRUTHS TO ALL OF YOU. THAT DEMANDS ME TO UNCLUTCH COMPLETELY FROM ALL TIME CONSCIOUSNESS AND TIME BOUND DECISIONS TO GET DOWN FROM SAMADHI.

*I AM SO HAPPY I HAVE FREED MYSELF FROM THE TIME BOUNDEDNESS. 

*I JUST REST IN SAMADHI.

*WHEN PARAMASHIVA SETTLES DOWN AND IS READY FOR SATSANG, I TELL THE SOCIAL MEDIA TEAM TO ANNOUNCE THE SATSANG. 

*I AM SO HAPPY FOR THE PEOPLE WHO ARE HERE FOR THE LIVE SATSANG. 

*WHAT I AM SHARING NOW IS THE MOST POWERFUL, BEAUTIFUL TRUTHS THAT DIRECTLY WORK AND ARE DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA.

*SOME OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL POWERFUL CONCLUSIONS, COGNITIONS PARAMASHIVA GAVE ME: 

LIFE HAS NO COMPLICATION. 
SOMETIMES YOU BELIEVE PEOPLE WHO ARE SAYING: ‘PARAMASHIVA IS FAR AWAY IN KAILASA, AS THE CORE OF BRAHMANDA, MACROCOSM. 
SOMETIMES YOU BELIEVE THAT PARAMASHIVA IS LITERALLY INSIDE YOU, NOT SOMEWHERE FAR AWAY IN KAILASA. 
BUT LISTEN TO THE TRUTH THAT PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF GAVE: HE IS FAR AWAY IN KAILASA AND INSIDE YOU, AS YOUR DEPTH, AS YOUR VERY CORE EXISTENCE, THE CENTER OF PINDANDA  - AS BOTH!

*IT IS LIKE A TIME WARP.

*PARAMASHIVA AND YOU ARE JUST DIRECTLY CONNECTED.

*HE IS MORE YOU THAN WHAT YOU KNOW AS YOU OR EVEN WHAT YOU THINK AS YOU.






Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
